name: Mario Story
text: I recently moved into a new home where James carpet did my wood floors. I  noticed a few bad spots in my flooring in the upstairs hallway and called them to get them repaired. They said they would come and repair them, but when the guy came the first time he mentioned he did not have the right equipment to fix the flooring. So I reschedule for another day, the appointment was made and they never showed. I called them again and they came to repair the work and I showed them some other spots that needed to be repaired. He said he would come back so I made an appointment and once again they never showed.  Now by this time about 2 months have past by. I called them and now I"m having the hardest time speaking with Scarlett, she is apparantly busy with other customers.  I am disappointed with James Carpet and trust me I will not be using them in the future! If I could put ZERO STARS I would.

name: S Kern
text: Deidre was the most helpful expert I think I've ever had!  And I'm old!  Seriously, this business deserves every bit of a 5 star rating.  They were outstanding in the entire transaction.

name: Tyler Green
text: I came in looking for some kitchen tile and worked with Deidre.  She provided hands down the best customer service I've received over the past several years.  She was attentive, knowledgeable, and followed through when we had an issue with a sample the manufacturer shipped that arrived broken.  I can't say enough good things about my experience with Deidre and would recommend going to her if at all possible.  Thanks!

name: Sue Gorman
text: Deidre was great! I've gotten carpet here multiple times. They have great prices and great service.

name: Candice Musgrove
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff! A good selection of options and they will definitely take the time with you to ensure you are happy.

name: Claudia Rhen
text: Great sales!  Cooperative!

name: Pamela Cox
text: Our experience with James Carpets was outstanding throughout the entire process. Diedre was helpful and helped me figure out just what we needed, and the crew of Preston, Greg and James Dean was superb! These guys worked hard to make sure we were happy with the job, even taking the extra time to make sure all of our floors were "squeak-free" before installing the new carpeting. This is our second 5 Star experience with James Carpets, and we highly recommend them to anyone who wants an excellent product and terrific customer service.

name: Jeffrey and Morgan Thomas
text: That's was the easiest most enjoyable experience we could have ever hoped for in picking flooring and tile. Scarlett is the best. Thank you so much. We recommend James Carpets over everyone.

name: lawton wade
text: Have used James Flooring 3-4 times and in different houses for both hardwoods and carpet.  The owner is a good man and his folks do really good work at the best prices Ive found . James Flooring also follows up to make sure you are pleased with their work - its surprising how few businesses do this. These folks are the best Ive found.

name: Brier Armstrong
text: Friendly people. A way better deal and carpet from Lowe's or Home Depot!

name: leslie sherban
text: This is my third remodel and I wouldn't have wanted to do it without James Carpets. I love how friendly everyone is and how fast and effortless they made the job. Thank you!

name: Freedom Found Farm
text: Excellent customer service...great people and friendly too!!!

name: liberty Kincannon
text: Great people and have a lot of options. Will go here over anywhere else for my flooring needs.

name: Ashley D
text: Alan helped me order my flooring. He is so wonderful! Thank you! Great price!

name: M K
text:
Disappointing service.

Our tiling work is only 1/2 way complete so I cannot review the work only that the workers who came to our home have been very nice and my complaint has nothing to do with them.

Our tile work was supposed to be completed yesterday 10/8.  It did not get complete because some of the wood did not match our floor (100% understandable!) We were told they would be back this morning to complete the work.  My husband takes the morning off of work and we have a photographer scheduled at 1pm to take photos to put our house on the market.  The morning passes and we never hear from anyone.  Finally my husband messages the worker directly and he said that they erew coming this afternoon instead.  Someone from James Carpets was supposed to reach out to us.  My husband has to take the full day off work and now we need to wait to put our house on the market.  Here's where the problem happened:

I call the store to see what happened.  When I explain the situation to the lady who answered her reply was "well, those phones fail us all the time dont they?  Is there anything else you need?" I asked for a Manager to call me. Someone called about an hour later and his response was almost unbelievable.  He explained that they had to change the wood. Great, but the issue here is that no one communicated with us that there would be a delay.  He talks in circles for a few minutes first blaming us, then the workers then he says he has "no idea why they didn't come this morning" ?? What?  We all understand why they didn't come the issue is with why someone didn't communicate this to us which caused a major inconvenience.

I do not recommend this company.  Good customer service is NOT difficult at all but obviously not something that they care about.

name: Noa Williams
text: Our builder installed hardwoods that was purchased from this company almost three years ago . The hardwoods were a terrible quality and extremely  difficult to maintain. After using the recommended products our floors got worse and worse. I reached out to James Carpet for help and the staff was rude and unwilling to understand my issues. I will never go with a company or builder that uses James Carpet for any of their products. It's going to be a very costly problem to rid our home of their terrible hardwoods.

name: Amanda Webster Hays
text:
Great service, affordable prices, beautiful installation!

I have worked for two separate builders spanning over the last several years, and both builders exclusively use James Carpets as their flooring & backsplash vendor.. and with great reason!  They offer the largest amount of color/material selections in their showroom with an extensive amount of knowledge for each type of product.  Scarlett, namely, has been such a big help in business and personal flooring decisions.  Not only is she extremely knowledgeable with all of the many products they offer, but she is also forthright with sharing extensive information on color variations (photos, additional samples, etc).  My husband and I also hired them to install tile, vinyl, hardwood, & backsplash into my personal home, and I'm beyond happy with their prices and completed work!

I would recommend James Carpets to anyone!!

text: With a large selection of products and a kind but down to earth sales representative, it's hard to go wrong with Randy Smalley. Even if I did not leave with any products in hand, I can definitely see this local business has anyone's next stop on their search for flooring.

name: Seth Kennedy
text: Mr. Smalley’s crew did a great job on our floor.

name: Aleece Wilson
text: We had the best experience with Issis and Sons, they were super helpful as we weighed different carpet options and Gary worked really hard to get our install set up asap. Top quality service, pricing, and carpet. We highly recommend!

name: Sandra
text: Very friendly and helpful. Lots of great selections

name: Luciano Costa
text: We went look for flooring for our new home under construction. Between our Saturday outfit, the Latino name and the accent the salesman kept insisting that we were on the wrong store and this was a "high end" satellite of their business ("no offense"). Offense taken, along with my business.

name: M. Smith
text: Great furniture selection, friendly staff, excellent customer service. They really go the extra mile for you as a customer, would highly recommend!

name: David Gibson
text:
AWESOME COMPANY.  Great selection and pricing, they really take time to know the use of something prior to making a recommendation.
Family owned and operated.

name: Kassady Gibson
text: Such a beautiful store with amazing furniture and rugs!  They have a great selection of both traditional and current.  Plus, their staff is so helpful.

name: Roderick Howe
text: Very nice

name: Kayla Tillman
text: I've been shopping for a couple new mattress sets trying to find the best deal. Went to several places and was about to give up and just break the bank, until I saw Alabama Overstock in Hartselle. Chris Moore, the owner helped me find the right mattress to fit my preferences. The money spent was a fraction of the other stores I went to. They carried the cooling bamboo pillows, cooling mattress protector, and sheet sets. Highly recommend them for your home furnishings and mattress needs!

name: Teri Watson
text: Great mattress store! Go see Chris Moore!

name: Cheri Sellers
text: We LOVE Alabama Overstock!!! They are very friendly and helpful and have great quality furniture and mattresses! We’ve bought a mattress and box springs, a master bedroom suite and bedroom furniture and mattress for our teenage son! Can’t beat their prices  for the quality anywhere!

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we hope you enjoy your bedroom group for years to come.

name: chris pike
text:
Great products, prices and service.
If you need furniture or mattress go by and see them. It will be well worth your time.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Anthony Bradford
text: If you are in need of furniture this is the place to go. Chris and his staff are awesome and very knowledgeable of the products they sale. Easy to work with on purchases.

resp.text: Thank you and we appreciate your business.

name: Demaris Johnson
text: Very nice people to buy from

name: Anna Boger
text: I’ve bought several mattress here always great quality and great service!

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we hope you are still enjoying your mattresses. Call us anytime if we can ever be of service to you.

name: Julie Trevarthen
text: Good selection.  Shannon went out of her way to make sure I got the chair I wanted.  Prices are better than other places we looked.  Will definitely use them again.

resp.text: Julie, we appreciate your business and thank you for the kind review.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Hamp Repper
text: Can’t go wrong buying here! Great selection, quality & prices.

resp.text: Hamp, thanks for the great review.  We appreciate it.

name: Lavonda Poe
text: I love high point furniture. They have beautiful pieces. There staff is so helpful and kind. I recommend this store to everyone. I give it a 10. Love you guys.

resp.text: Lavonda, we have always enjoyed dealing with you and Charles and cherish the friendship it grew into.  I hope you are doing well.  Thanks, Reggie

name: A Carter
text: I don't recommend this store. The quality of the furniture I got from there was very low graded.  The people that they use to deliver the furniture a background check should be done on them. The young man managing the store at the time was a really good person.

resp.text: I am sorry you didn't have a good experience.  Please give us a call so we can help.

name: Rachel Kidd
text: A little disappointed that our living room furniture ordered in August has not come in! Thank you COVID-19!

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Carol West
text: High Point has beautiful furniture and are very helpful

resp.text: Carol thank you for the lovely review and we hope to see you again soon!

name: Sandi Gornati
text: We needed help to purchase just the right sofa for our mom.  They were so helpful. The transaction was easy and the piece was delivered right on schedule.  We loved it and so did Mom!

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  We enjoyed working with you and glad that you were pleased with your purchase.

name: laurie dunford
text: High Point Furniture has a beautiful showroom and a great selection in a range of price points. Reggie was so easy and great to work with! He was able to work with me a lot through text which made it so much easier for me to finalize the order and coordinate all the details. The delivery and set up went great also!

resp.text: Thank you Laurie for the kind review.  We really appreciate your business.  Let us know if you need anything else.

name: Sheila Blackwood
text: High Point Furniture is a great place to find beautiful furniture and decor.  The staff is so helpful and friendly!  They help you find unusual decorations to make your home beautiful and unique.

resp.text: Thanks Shelia.  We have always enjoyed helping you.

name: Jamie Smith
text: Great selection of furniture and even better people! We loved our experience each team we made a trip. They gave great recommendations!

resp.text: Thanks Jamie for the great review.  We really appreciate your business.

name: lanie parker
text: I could not have been happier with my visit to High Point.  A lot of the furniture today is cheaply made or the high end furniture is so expensive.  I picked out a quality made sofa for a very fair price.  The people could not have been more helpful and courteous.  So worth the drive to Jasper.  My future furniture store.

resp.text: Thank you Lanie for kind review.  We enjoyed working with you and hope to see you again soon.

name: Carol Poupore
text: We love our leather reclining sofa from High Point. The staff and owner worked with us to get exactly what we wanted  it was delivered when promised and it’s absolutely beautiful. We highly recommend High Point!

resp.text: Carol, thank you for the kind words.  Let us know if we can help in the future.

name: Julie Ryland
text: I really appreciated the personal attention I received from my sales woman. She really listened to my likes and dislikes and steered me in the direction of furnishings that appealed to my taste. Prices were in line, and the delivery process was a breeze.

resp.text: Thank you for business and kind comments.  We enjoyed doing business with you.

name: Scott McCary
text: Best furniture I’ve ever dealt with. Not a chain store, owned by a really great family, quality service and high quality furniture. My go to from here on when purchasing furniture

resp.text: Scott, thanks for the review.  We have always enjoyed working with you.  If we can help in the future please let us know.

name: Sharon Lofstad
text: Friendly staff.  Delivery guys are superb.Very professional. Great service, great selection.  What more can u ask for?

name: Maria McClung
text: Great service, lots of choices, good prices. we bought two recliners, two lamps and a rug. Delivered when promised. The guys even helped move out the old furniture.

resp.text: Thanks Maria.  We enjoyed working with you and glad you liked everything.

name: Yolanda Hicks
text: Nice and friendly!  They kept  me updated on delivery. Easy to work with.

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  If you need anything please let us know.

name: C. Winn Williams
text:
Very helpful salespeople. We have bought most of our furniture from here and more than likely we will be back!

And they Deliver!

resp.text: Winn I appreciate your business and thanks for the review.

name: Jama Hoffman
text: I emailed the store about what I was looking for, got Reggie, who promptly emailed me back with pictures and prices of things I might like. When I came to the store, unannounced, he took his time with my husband and I, showing us what we told him we were interested in finding for our new home. I never felt pressured. I ended up buying a sectional and 4 barstools from him and he surprised me by delivering the stools a day early, with fabric samples for outdoor furniture I was wanting to purchase, but thought I would have to make the hour drive over and back to look at samples. He sent the ones I mentioned to him in an email with the delivery men so I could match them to my current color scheme and  then call and order it over the phone. They have given me exemplary customer service, the best prices of anyone I have shopped with and have earned my business for all the other needs I have for this retirement home. My daughter was the one who referred me to them, having received the same treatment when she purchased a new sofa for her home. They are the best!

name: Anne Glasgow
text: Great business! Friendly and caring sales people and super quality merchandise! Will shop Highpoint with all my furniture needs.

resp.text: Anne, we really appreciate your business and hope to help you out in the future.

name: Kimberly McDade
text: Great selection of furniture. The entire staff is willing to assist you with as much as you need. They don’t hound you, they are eager to help you find what you are looking for.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review.  We really appreciate it.

name: Paige Morris
text: Reggie is always so helpful! The furniture is beautiful and we've been happy with every purchase

resp.text: Thanks Paige.  We really enjoy working with you and Dan.  Look forward to serving you again.

name: Amanda Darty
text: Outstanding selection of quality furniture and home furnishings at affordable prices!  Excellent service.  If they don't have what you are looking for on the showroom they will gladly try to order it for you.  I've been a customer at Highpoint for over 10 years and have never been disappointed!

name: Bama Tams
text: I have been shopping here for 15 years.  Great service, friendly staff, quality furniture at affordable prices.

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  We appreciate your business.  Have a great 2020!

resp.text: Donna we appreciate your business and hope you have a great Christmas.

name: Angie Abercrombie
text: Love this place, always seems to have exactly what i’m Needing!

resp.text: Angie, thanks for your business through the years.

text: Wife and I have bought several pieces of furniture from Reggie in the last couple years. Large selection of quality furniture at a fair price! Reggie and his staff have always been very informative and went out of their way to make sure we bought what we wanted! Highly recommend them for all your furniture needs.

name: JJ Hadder
text: I'm normally don't do reviews for businesses, but High Point Furniture has been a favorite of my family for years.  I value the friendship I have made with Reggie, Beverly, Dean and the rest of the staff there.  They have always went out of their way to make sure we were taken care of when me or my wife drops by.  They just recently picked up Lay Z Boy, so I feel a purchase coming up in the near future for me!!

name: Kim Calvert
text: The owner Mr. Watts went way out of his way to make sure we found the perfect piece for our home! They had a tremendous selection and everything is beautiful! Our furniture was delivered the same day by two of the most polite young men I have ever met, they also did a fantastic job of setting everything up like I wanted! The entire experience was great and I would recommend High Point Furniture to everyone!

name: Iisa wehrstein
text: I know this is a higher end store but they are absolutely over priced

resp.text: Would you be kind enough to let us know why you think we are overpriced?

name: Jason Farley
text: My wife and I came to High Point Furniture with a specific need. They were extremely helpful in finding us the perfect piece for our home. We left very satisfied and glad to not see the entire store in an attempt to push other furniture. We will definitely visit again.

name: GoTracieWin
text: After our home was flooded, we were in the market for a bedroom suite to replace my daughter's damaged one.  We went to every furniture store within driving distance, but finally found exactly what we wanted right here in Jasper!  Mr. Watts, Dean, & the entire staff @ High Point were so professional, helping us to find just what we needed, without being "pushy".  We purchased beautiful, high-quality furniture for half the price of the other stores.  The young delivery men were quick & skillful in bringing in & setting up our pieces. I cannot recommend this business highly enough.  Very pleased.

name: Patrick Johnson
text: I just recently had a GREAT experience shopping at High Point Furniture in Jasper.  Very large selection of extremely nicer quality furniture to choose from.  A guy named Reggie Watts helped me and was very professional and attentive to our furniture needs.

name: Roderick Money
text: Really good people awesome service... And Lora is the best

name: Angie Long
text: Our bedroom, dining and living room furniture came from High Point Furniture and we couldn’t be happier.  Highly recommend shopping here.

resp.text: Angie we appreciate your business through the years and hope to serve you in the future.

name: Clint McLain
text: Always professional! Great quality! Great value! And on time!

resp.text: Thank you Clint.  I appreciate the business through the years.

name: Dustin Myhand
text: Reggie and his staff at High Point Furniture are first class all the way!  We've bought several pieces from High Point and have never had anything less than a fantastic experience.  The sales staff are knowledge and don't pressure you.  The delivery and set up has always gone off without a hitch.  The quality of the items at High Point is WAY higher than the prices!  We've shopped many places of supposedly comparable quality, here in town and elsewhere and have not found anyone who can compete with High Point from a quality, customer service, ease of doing business and price standpoint.  In today's world of online shopping and the absence of relationship building while doing business, Reggie and the folks at High Point are a breath of fresh air!

name: Archie Burgess
text: Great knowledge of products / great service

resp.text: Thanks Archie you are the best

You gave 8 of them a 1-star, but 1 business was lucky enough to earn a 2-star rating from you.  Sounds to me like the businesses may not be the problem.

text: Bought a fridge and even made a $300 down payment. Was told they would remove old fridge. First off they were 2 hours late getting to house but I didn't care at the time as I wanted My fridge. They said they couldn't deliver it at the moment because there was a bookcase in the hallway they would bring it back later when my daughter moved the bookcase because I'm disabled when my daughter got home at 1 first thing she did was disassemble the fiberboard bookcase and I called the store back up right away and suddenly it was a different story. He said he was going to give me a refund on my money and not sell me the refrigerator after my daughter had gone through almost 2 hours to move that bookcase and his men had said that they would be back later with the fridge. HIS remark was my men don't run the show I do. Because that fiberboard bookcase was too heavy for her to move and couldn't be disassembled with screws it's going to have to be put back together with Gorilla Glue if it's not permanently.

If your looking for quality pieces, tons of selections, the friendliest staff then look no further than Stock & Trade. I’m definitely a customer for life!!

name: Jessica Bahouth
text: We love Stock and Trade. The customer service is incredible. We work with a particular fabulous consultant, John, who has helped us elevate the look of our home. He is very knowledgeable and has wonderful taste. The entire staff is wonderful and friendly. I didnt feel pressured or hovered over. The prices are fair and the inventory is beautiful. John truly goes above and beyond to make sure we get exactly what we want. Even if he has to order it! wish I could give them 6 stars!

name: Denise Upton
text: John Herrington Interior Designer for Stock and Trade helped me redecorate my condo in Orange Beach. He does an awesome job and is great with mixing colors and accessories. He also helped me decide on a rug for my living room as well as new decorative pillows and a new coffee table. He is excellent to work with, makes quick and accurate decisions and responded to my phone calls or texts. I have used his decor services before Stock and Trade and will use him again in the future. I highly recommend him.

name: Candace Thompson
text: Stock and Trade is by far my favorite spot to purchase for my personal home and for my Designing Company. Sales Associate John Herrington is so amazing to deal with, he goes above and beyond to find what I’m looking for and helps me put things together for the perfect look. I can’t say enough wonderful things about this place. I highly recommend!

name: Pam Breedlove
text: What a fabulous find! A friend told me about the store so I decided to come and look for accessories for our beach house. I was pleasantly surprised to find such a well designed space with beautiful options. The vignettes were well thought out and appointed; a much more sophisticated look than the Destin store. While shopping I found out that John Herrington was responsible! He had helped me at his old job with an apartment for our son in Los Angeles. Great eye and sincere service. Plan to be back at this store to work with John on our future projects!

name: Sheena Mincy
text:
My husband and I came into Stock & Trade after loosing our home in Hurricane Sally. From the moment we entered the store, the service we received was incredible. We explained our situation to John [Herrington] and he went above and beyond to help us make our house into a home again. John’s knowledge of interior decorating is second to none. He’s now one of our trusted friends and continues to follow up w/ our family.
We’ve been back to the store a number of times, since our initial visit and everyone there has been extremely helpful and welcoming. Especially, when we bring our 5 y/o. Karley is always great about playing with her.
S&T is definitely our go to for home furnishings!

name: Jason Lawrence
text:
The kind of customer service that makes you cringe.

Edit:  Nah I am good, no need to reach out to you, I walked in the store last week. I said I was just looking, I was asked 5x before we left if we needed help finding things and many times sales was trying to strike up conversation.  Just looking means that I want to look and not be harassed.

resp.text: Jason, We hate to see this.  Could you please call or send more details about your experience to SpanishFort@StockandTrade.com.  Thank you!

name: Kalyn Miller
text: This team is amazing! They make you feel comfortable in the store and goes above and beyond to help you create a beautiful space!!

name: Gerald Smith
text:
My wife and I visited this store Tuesday March 30 at 1:00pm. Strolled through the entire store without not one hello from any employee.
I don't understand why you would spend so much money on advertising to get floor traffic when you don't even acknowledge a potential customer?

resp.text:
Gerald,
We hate to hear about this experience.  We are looking at video to see where the breakdown occurred because that is not typical.   We do provide a non-pressure environment and received a complaint just last week from a customer because he felt we asked if he had any questions or needed any assistance too many times in his opinion, but in this case low pressure was taken too far.   If you could provide any more details via email to support@stockandtrade.com so that we can look into it further would be greatly appreciated.  I sincerely apologize and hope that you will give us another chance to show you what we have to offer.

text: Beautiful store and friendly staff

The owner & staff was wonderful & patient while helping me to choose the perfect patio furniture. Very warm & friendly atmosphere, with no sales pressure. They really do want you to be happy. Delivery was made on time & they were as excited as I was to see it.
Beautiful furniture & incredible people - don't miss out on this experience!!

name: Mark Cecil
text: As someone that has been in retail for over 30 years I can honestly say I have never encountered a company that did more right than these folks do. From excellent help in the showroom, to a very nice handwritten thank you card, to a courtesy call when our furniture arrived (early by the way) by one of the friendliest voices I have ever heard, to the nicest and most professional delivery I could not be happier. Oh and by the way due to our large invoice we even got some free pillows. I gave 5 stars because I can't give 6!!!!

resp.text: Mark, thank you so much for your kind words! We are always so happy to hear that our customers had a great experience and are enjoying their purchase. We hope that you come back in and see us!

text: This furniture doesn't even need cushions. It is perfect support. Its high in price but its got a lifetime warranty to back it up. EDIT: I forgot to mention they did throw in free pillows, free delivery all assembled, a hand written thank you and polite the entire way through.

Hi Joseph,
Thank you for the review and we are glad to hear you are enjoying your furniture. Breezesta furniture is a great product!

name: Jeri Miller
text: Old Gin Carpets has been in south Huntsville for many years, as have I! My late husband was a  building/remodeling contractor, and frequentlly purchased carpet or flooring from them, and often had them to install it. We were never disappointed! I have also bought many rugs for my personal use, and have always been pleased with their integrity, service, and prices. My sister-in- law from Illinois often bought from them and had her rug shipped to her home, thus saving sales tax. A well-run, family owned business.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Jeri!  It's wonderful to know that we have made a customer happy.  It's why we're in business.  Looking forward to your next visit!

name: Matt Adams
text: Worst flooring company in Huntsville!!! Do not use them! If I could give zero stars I would. Bought a house had hardwoods and carpet installed. They waited until the last minute to start on the project, didn’t finish on time, ran out of flooring and had to order more! Called them to get the flooring fixed because they did such a bad job installing it and they were very rude! They only started to care when I was talking bad about them loud enough for them to hear!!! Save your money and go to a better company!!!!!!!

name: Joseph R. Huneycutt III
text: Quality, Quick, and Quite friendly.

name: Scott D
text:
Botched the installation of my floors and left me out over $10,000 in repairs to fix the problem!

Summary: Old Gin Carpets installed wood flooring in the main living areas of our home. Within the first few months the floor visibly began to cup and buckle and remains that way today. 	The owner said he would, “make it right!” 	We have had to contact Old Gin Carpets over and over trying to get them to address this problem. However, well over a year after installation the problem with our floors remains. Our business with Old Gin Carpets has resulted in a loss of over $10,000 to repair the problem.

As part of a remodeling effort in our home, we had Old Gin Carpets install wood flooring in our main living area. After a few months we noticed a problem that I will refer to as ‘cupping’ on the new flooring. This effect was evident in all areas of the floor and worsened also resulting in ‘bowing’ in places where the floor raised high enough that it became a tripping hazard. I provided photos to Old Gin which was eventually followed by a visit from the owners, They told me that they had never seen anything like this and that they would do whatever needed to be done to, “make it right!” I had hoped that such a strong statement by the owner would surely lead to a resolution.

Unfortunately, months followed and it’s been well over a year now since the flooring was installed. During that time we have lived with the constant embarrassment and humiliation of having to explain to guests why our floors are messed-up and why in all this time it hasn’t been fixed. Old Gin has had multiple flooring inspectors look at the issue, but no exact cause has been mentioned. I have consulted with 2 licensed general contractors who have independently concluded that the lack of installation of a proper vapor barrier beneath the flooring is the most likely cause. It was also determined that there were no existing water leaks. I have also examined the National Wood Flooring Association and the flooring supplier’s own Installation Guidelines, Methods and Instructions that validates what I was told by these general contractors that more preparation should have been done prior to installation.

Old Gin was paid in full at the time of the installation. Our expectation of a North Alabama BBB A+ rated company would be one that would stand behind their products and service. It seems like it has been impossible to get resolution and it will end up costing us twice as much to repair as we will now have to remove the damaged floor and install a new one. This problem has taken far too much time and effort to address and many excuses have been given for the great delay in fixing the floor.
We feel that Old Gin has not been truthful in providing their products and services and that they have not met our expectations. Relative to the ideals listed by Old Gin Carpets on their website, we certainly have not been the focus of their business, we have not been happy with the product and we have received zero value for our money. In fact, we feel that they have flat-out taken us for our money!

name: Dixie Carr
text: They made me feel right at home. Thank-you so much, Dixie

resp.text: You're welcome, Dixie!  It was a pleasure to work with you. We hope to see you again.

text: I recently needed to furnish several rooms in our new home. Ashley White came to my home and listened to my needs, measured my spaces, and helped me to identify the pieces needed for each room. Ashley is an exceptional designer who actively listens to understand her clients’ needs. From there, Ashley helps them navigate the many custom options while narrowing down on the functional solutions that reflect their style and design preference. Thank you so much for your 5-Star Review. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your experience and hope that your furnishings bring you joy for many years to come!
- Birmingham Design Center

name: Cynthia Parker
text: My experience at Ethan Allen has been extremely stress free and pleasant. This is due primarily to the friendly, yet professional service of Ashley White.  Her eye for design along with her helpful guidance (actually visiting the space in my home) has made the purchase of my new bed room décor a cinch! Looking forward to purchasing more excellent quality furniture as well as working with Ashley. I appreciate the time she put into making this experience a great one!

resp.text:
Hi Cynthia! Thank You for providing insight about your experience at the Birmingham Design Center. We are so glad that you all decided to give Ethan Allen a try at earning your business. Professional Designer Ashley White actively listens to her client’s needs and concerns in order to tailor solutions that are both functional and aesthetically appealing. Ashley is ecstatic that you enjoyed the design process in entirety. Cynthia, Thank You the 5-Star Rating and for choosing us to be a part of your home furnishing experience!
-Birmingham Design Center

name: Alexa Mallard
text: Ashley was a great help in finding the perfect bed to compliment our EA furniture we bought twenty years ago. She was creative and a great communicator who  helped me visualize a new look. resp.text: Hi Alexa, thank you for your review. Ashley is a great asset to our team in Birmingham. Safety has always been a focus for Ethan Allen, and especially during this current challenge we are committed to keeping our staff and clients safe.  Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Mary Neil
text: Ashley was very helpful in the showroom and drawing layouts with pricing.  She reached out, was good at communicating, sharing her cell and email. Ashley made it easy and quick working on our sectional, developing the final scheme and completing pricing for our order.  We are very pleased.

resp.text: Hi Mary, thank you so much for the feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with Ashley at our Birmingham Design Center. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Elizabeth Reed
text: Remodeling a kitchen after a house fire is stressful, to say the least.  Our kitchen table and chairs came from Ethan Allen nearly 20 years ago so I went back to them to see if they had counter hight stools that would coordinate with existing furniture.  Ashley White knew exactly what I was looking for.  She suggested the perfect leg and finish based on a photo of my table and chairs.  Our new stools were just delivered and they are perfection!  It's always a pleasure to shop in Ethan Allen.  Thank you Ashley, for also making it fun!

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, thank you for such great feedback on your experience with Ethan Allen. We are so glad you were able to work with Ashley and she took such great care of you. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: john placey
text: We have enjoyed owning Ethan Allen furniture and furnishings over the decades!  Some pieces like our dining room chairs and table still look and feel brand new even though purchased in the early 1970s!  Their staff is always friendly and helpful!  A bit pricey but we have found that you truly get to enjoy what you paid for!!!

name: Ronald Payne
text: After searching many stores, we found our perfect dining room table at our local Ethan Allen and it was on sale. The table had two leaves which would be needed to host our large family group for Thanksgiving. The sales lady was most helpful and promised that it would be delivered before Thanksgiving only about six weeks away. We were kept informed every step on the way and our table arrived four days prior to Thanksgiving. The leaves are a little hard to get in and out but that should get better with more use. We love the table!

resp.text: Ronald, I am so happy to hear about your experience! We love when the process goes smoothly. I know you will enjoy your table for many Thanksgivings to come. Thank you for reaching out to let us know, we appreciate it.

name: Catherine Benefield
text: The whole experience with Ethan Allen has been pleasant and productive. Designer Kelley Horton guided me through the process of selecting furniture (sofa, 2 chairs, ottomans) and fabrics. The furniture was delivered by professionals who NOT ONCE bumped a wall or door frame. They carefully set up the furniture and carted away the wrappings. The designer then brought paint samples and assisted in selecting a paint color for the walls. From start to finish, I was treated with professionalism and courtesy. The furniture is well made, beautiful in my home, and most importantly, comfortable. Will I purchase from Ethan Allen on Hwy. 150 in Hoover again? Absolutely.

resp.text: Hi Catherine! Thank you for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience at our Hoover location. We appreciate it very much! We are pleased to hear that Kelley could make designing your home a breeze and know it MUST look beautiful. Thank you for also pointing out how amazing our delivery team was; they are quite the asset to Ethan Allen! We hope you enjoy your beautiful pieces for many years to come and appreciate your business very much.

name: Amy Rickles
text: Ashely did a great job of helping us pick a style of furniture, wood accents, and fabric. Well worth the time and money spent. Would highly recommend.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Amy. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. Ashley is a huge asset to our Birmingham team!

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Kelly, at Ethan Allen, was so fantastic!! She took so much time out for me & assisted me with choosing the fabric for my cornices and curtains. I love my new curtains!!! The reason I rated 3 stars is because Ethan Allen is way over priced I found the same rug I was going to buy from Ethan Allen at RH for much less. I understand Ethan Allen has nice fabrics but I've seen much nicer for far less.

resp.text: Cameron, thank you so much for the feedback! I am so thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your new curtains! Custom curtains can be a big project, I am so happy that Kelly was able to partner with you and design and implement something you love.

name: Pat Ford
text: Great purchasing and service experience! Ashley greeted us warmly when we arrived and quickly showed us what we were looking for and provided material samples that were perfect for our needs.  She made the whole process quick and easy.  The delivery guys were the best I have ever seen.  They  handled the new chairs and sofa with care and were careful to not damage our wood floor in moving the sofa into place.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review Pat! We're happy to hear everything went perfect during your delivery and that our team did an excellent job as well. Thanks for taking the time to write about us. We know Ashley appreciates your compliment as well!

name: Sherry Vaughn
text:
I have been buying Ethan Allen furniture for over 25 years because I know their furniture is a quality product and is timeless. But the thing that I have come to appreciate the most about Ethan Allen is their free design service. The designers know their business well and do a great job.
Kelley and Lauren with Hoover Ethan Allen have both been so helpful with my current home renovation.
I literally cannot praise Kelley Horton enough for how she has helped me to transform my home into a more modern and updated style utilizing what I currently have and incorporating new pieces to blend. She has spent countless hours  in helping me to choose the right pieces for my home including furniture, window treatments, rugs, artwork, bedding, and even down to the smallest decorative accent pieces. My home looks beautifully done with effortless design and functionality now.
The entire process from designing to delivery and installation has been very professional and I could not have asked for better.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome review Sherry! It brings us so much joy to know how appreciated our brand is and that everyone on our team gives their all. Kelley goes above and beyond for her clients so we're glad to hear that you find her as special as we do! We know every detail matters and strive to ensure that our customer service is superb. Thank you again for all your kind words Sherry. Enjoy your newly renovated home!

name: Randy Mason
text: My wife and I were on vacation and staying at the hotel next door and decided to browse.  Ashley did such an awesome job reviewing and showing us the bed we looking for we bought one that day. We could have waited until we got home to Michigan but really liked the kind and genuine service that Ashley provided. That was our first time in an Ethan Allen store and we have now set up a home appointment back in Michigan. Thank you Ashley!!

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review, Randy! We are delighted to hear how welcoming Ashley was and greatly appreciate you stopping by. Thanks for joining the Ethan Allen family!

name: Emma Bolden
text: From browsing the store to having my pieces delivered, the entire process of buying furniture from the Ethan Allen in Hoover was a dream. We were greeted warmly as we came in the store, and designer Kelley Horton was extremely helpful and kind (and funny!). The delivery crew was prompt, respectful, and careful. An excellent experience all-around!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review of our Hoover location, Emma! We're happy to hear that Kelley made your experience with Ethan Allen a delightful one and that our delivery team took it one step further. We appreciate your business!

name: Alissa Hill
text: I would never purchase from Ethan Allen for anything that has to be made like furniture! We purchase a formal dining table and ten chairs to accompany it. Not only did our table show up with a large dent underneath (unfortunately we didn’t notice until the delivery men sped away) which they refused to do anything about but we placed the order in June 2019.... it’s now October 29 we still have no chairs. Their customer service department has been zero help with figuring out why. I would expect this from Wayfair  but when you spend over 6000.00 dollars for a table and chairs you expect far superior customer service. Guess I’ve learned my lesson and will forever stay out of Ethan Allen.

resp.text:
Alissa, I am so sorry to hear about your experience. I would love to look into it further and find a resolution but I am unfortunately not able to locate your order. Was it possibly purchased under another name? Or could you provide a phone number or order number? If you wouldn't mind emailing me at laura.smith@ethanallen.com I would love to see what we can do to make this situation right.

I look forward to working with you on a resolution.

Laura

text: Bought an expensive leather sleeper sofa with anvair mattress that does not work! Call and representative cam out verified slow leas in air bed. NO OTHER RESPONSE!

The replacement air mattress has been ordered and they have the estimated promise date to pass along to you. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. She asked questions, REALLY listened, and that's where her innate creativity kicked in. She has "nailed it" time after time with unique suggestions, and I look forward to working with her again as we update this home. When we asked them about it they told us they are universal screws!  Go to Lowes or Home Depot and ask for universal furniture screws!  Called corporate no help! Don't waste your time. Called Peach Tree, GA and they ordered what i needed in 3 minutes.If you want Ethan Allen go to Peach Tree, GA.  If you want better service go to Wal-Mart.

name: Amy Johnston
text: Pricey. Not a great selection.

resp.text:
Thank you Amy for taking the time to leave a review. Ethan Allen is high end furniture and intended to last, we stand by our quality and craftsmanship, this is where you see the difference in the pricing from us to the other brands. The pricing is in line with the high end market for these reasons. We offer a complimentary design service with talented professional designers who are there to help as much or as little as you would like. We also offer Great, flexible finance options. Ethan Allen is always working to stay relevant with the trends but keeping our classic options still available, introducing new introductions every few months.

We appreciate you taking the time to visit our Design Center and wish you luck on you search for the right selections for your home!

And cant wait to go back to Sabrina's to pick out more things for my home. ♡

name: Karen Simmons
text:
UPDATE: October 1st she issued me a full refund! Thanks

Please Be Aware Of This Business😡😡 SHARE

I purchased a brand new $800 lift chair recliner from this place. I bought it on a Saturday evening and contacted them on Monday to let them know something was wrong with the chair. They would not let me return it. It was under warranty so I had them send some one out to look at it. The guy came week 2. Agreed the whole time that something was wrong with my chair but he wasn’t sure how to fix it. He sent the report to Sabrina’s Furniture Store week 3 and she said nothing was wrong with it. I hung up and called the manufacturer in Mississippi they said the brake for the footrest was not working. Therefore my footrest slowly goes down while sitting in it. They sent me a new motor for it. I contacted Sabrina back and she was gonna send someone out to put it on. So I’ve waited all week and nobody has showed up or called. I contacted Sabrina to find out why nobody has showed up to fix it and she said the system is kicking out the maintenance order. I told her I was tired of waiting because my feet were staying swollen from not staying elevated. I also told her I would bring the chair back tomorrow and swap it out for a new one. She said they were all out of stock. So I said I would bring it back and get my money back. She agreed to it but then wanted to charge me a $200 restocking fee. Mind you this is a brand new $800 chair that has been tore up since I purchased it.

name: Deirdre Taylor
text: I only go to home Depot if Lowe's doesn't have what I need, and that's rare. I always have a problem picking up orders. You can't just call in to have it brought to you by curbside because they claim to be too busy to get your information. When you go in, if the order is not in that little closet behind them, they'll just tell you it's not there rather than to go to the back and get it. I order a lot and never have a problem with Lowe's. It took an act of congress to finally get my complete order from Home Depot. One young lady, Kia went out of her way to help me and it wasn't even her department. Thanks to her I have everything. I only shop here when I absolutely have no choice.

name: Anithea M
text: Got in and got out! Found what I wanted on the app!

name: Liz R
text: Everything seems to be easy to locate. If you are using The Home Depot app most of their inventory counts are accurate or up-to-date for products on shelf

name: Silvery Nova
text: The first problem is the delivery service company that Home Depot uses for direct deliveries,Central Transport. My 1st initial delivery date changed three time before it was actually attempted to be delivered on March 3rd. On March 3rd the shipment came on a long bed truck with a pallet dolly. My shipment is a pallet of 33 boxes of porcelain tile., plus 7 additional boxes they put on the same pallet. The right side of the pallet was coming apart due to the immense weight of the tile . The driver could not move the pallet down the truck. He was not going to be able to pull it up the small slope on my driveway. What on earth were they even thinking?They needed a fork lift. I called Home Depot and they got the Transport company on the line while I was on hold. I ended up being told the transport company needed to take care of this and they would contact me in 24 to 48 hours. Which they never did. I had to call them. On 3/5 Friday I called central transport and they told me the shipment would be delivered on Monday between 11 and 12. They never showed. I checked the shipment tracking and found that they changed it to Tuesday 3/9! I got no call, text, or phone call.So Tuesday 3/9 I message them to find out eta. They said the drivers hadn't left yet and to keep checking they will update me. That never happened. So I wait and wait and I get a call from Home Depot letting me know the tile has arrived at THE STORE. I was never told anything about this.They will be delivering the tile on Monday 3/15....

name: Sandra Cauley
text:
I went in the garden center and told girl at registry, that  I wanted 2 medium bags of Miracle-Gro potting soil, and help getting it n putting it in car.  No help came, then she told me go in back pick it up.  Finally realized she charged me for garden soil, I ask her to give me potting soil and charge me for the difference.  She said she couldn't, I had go customer service.  I told her I wasn't able, that why I parked out in front garden center and ask for help.  I told her I would eat the loss and never come there again.

So my thinking leads me to believe the person I spoke to on the phone didn't bother to check or maybe something with system either way wasted my time and here's the kicker the way the guy tried to put it was like I could go to another home depot after I already paid. name: Robyn Curry
text:
**EDIT**
Since the freezer mishap below the management staff (namely Dave) has gone above and beyond to make things right by me. I feel like The Home Depot has redeemed themselves and they have earned my business once again.

I ordered an upright freezer to be delivered to my home. I missed three days of work for no-show deliveries and countless hours on the phone trying to get a freezer delivered and all I got in return was excuses and finger pointing. I had three managers from the West Mobile location involved in this situation (Dave, Cameron, and Jonathan) as well as the customer service help line. They were all aware of the fiasco that had occurred with this delivery yet when I asked what could be done no solution was offered. After a month of no freezer from the Home Depot I cancelled the order and bought one from Lowe’s. I had it the very next day. The Home Depot was always my go-to home improvement store but in light of the lack of customer service in this particular situation I think I’ll reconsider that.

text:
If you order appliances from somewhere, do yourself a favor and not order from Home Depot. First, the people who are selling the appliances do not know much about them. I was told that for installation of my microwave, I needed an outlet in the wall that it was being installed on. Great. I'm good. WRONG!!! The outlet had to be above the microwave.... Something that would have been nice to know, but they could not communicate that properly.
Then, the delivery/installation people had no idea what they were doing. They were more of a delivery company, not an installation professional. They could not install my gas range. They damaged my microwave. So, really, they weren't even a good delivery company. Home Depot just subs out delivery to the cheapest company....and you can see the quality when your damaged items arrive!
And I pray for you if you have ANY problems with your delivery or installation!!!
Count on a couple of things: 1) You will spend hours on the phone getting to talk to the right person. Once you think that you have the right person, they will tell you they have to check on something and they will have to call you back. OR, the right person is "on lunch" and they will call you back. After giving them ample time for "lunch" (3 hours) when you call them back, you will be told that they were "off today" but they will return your call in the morning.
Basically, it's a game of ping-pong and it takes days to get simple questions answered because, obviously, no one who works there wants to actually do anything.
I can't believe I dropped over $7K in there and they can't even answer a simple question!!!!
Buyer beware!!! Shop at Lowe's!!!

name: Lacey Paquin
text: I ordered $1,600 worth of appliances on black Friday to furnish my investment property. I scheduled them to be delivered on Friday, 12/22, and I was told the delivery time frame would be from 2pm-6pm. I planned accordingly and the my appliances were never delivered! No CALL or anything. It took me 4 different phone calls to reach an actual person. The delivery people could not be reached. I waited at the property until 10pm. I went to the store the next day and spoke with the manager, and apparently I was the 3rd customer complaining of no delivery and no notification. The store could not reach the delivery service because they were closed, and would not re-open again until that Tuesday after Christmas. I was told they "might" start calling customers then to attempt to re-schedule deliveries. I found this to be completely unprofessional and unacceptable. I cancelled my order and was refunded my money. I am showing my rental Wednesday and it will be empty. Home Depot has hurt my business.

They pointed me in the direction I needed to go. Upon my arrival of the bath tub isles another associate was there eager and ready to assist me. He opened the merchandise and checked for defects and everything to my satisfaction. None of which I have ever experienced at lowes. Even on the way to check out associates asked if there was anything more they could do to help. Overall my experience at Home Depot was outstanding. There was a group of men standing there talking, and I couldn't really get any of them to help. I went to the customer service desk and waited for a page for about 10 mins. I just left. That was the first time that happened. Usually if you can find someone, they're extremely nice and helpful, but you have to hunt for them. Another time a fellow customer ended up explaining the tools I needed and where to find them because there was no one to be found. I don't really leave bad reviews, but this store needs more employees it seems like. And some serious help.

name: Michael Perry
text:
Like Home Depot - it is very extremely hard to get good assistance from store associates.  They are few and far between.  If or when you do finally get some assistance - they are extremely untrained for an area that they are not assigned to.

All associates should be highly trained in all areas of the store.  And there should be more associates to assist customers.

name: Jimmy Melvin
text: The customer service is usually on point. The only reason for the 3 stars is this location is consistently out of basic materials needed for electrical work. There have been several times I’ve had to actually look on the top shelf at overstock to find what I need if it’s even there. The store however is kept clean and aisles clear.

name: Samantha Wiley
text: Why does your website guarantee satisfaction within thirty days of a paint purchase and claim I can exchange it or get money back? I was just told by the paint desk and customer service your company does not do that. They said people come in showing the website all the time but never do it.

name: jenn0810
text: Nobody cares about customer service any more. Can’t even get someone to check out a 75 year old veteran when there are several people with their aprons on standing around talking to one another. No reason to tell someone to check themselves out and you getting paid to stand there. Absolutely ridiculous.

name: Fitzgerald Hampton
text: Had a bathroom project I was doing I needed a small havksaw and extra blades.  I found everything with no problem made the purchase and left the store. Had no customer associate interaction whatsoever. Which goes back to me saying that Lowe's has very limited amount of associates working throughout the day in each department and they don't have anyone to help customers when needed.

text: Lots of parking easy entry and exit handicapped accessibility clean clean restrooms helpful employees I went to look at plants they had a large variety I was pleased at the prices of what I bought.I went inside and found a plant to put in a seashell I had brought home from the beach that was a surprise.I noticed they had everything to turn your outdoors into your own oasis.Grills canopies plants furniture firepits torches and so much more.Happy hunting always check your local stores website for great deals

Now my item was on a shelf 25 feet up . He located a lift to get my 1 item . My shopping was finished in 5 minutes. Store was clean and employees very helpful. I will return.

Next thing we see like 3 Lowe’s employees walking around watching us like we were trying to steal freaking plants! They literally followed us until we went to self checkout. Then more started gathering around watching while we were checking out. I feel like they were racial profiling by sending that many employees to follow us and I felt very uncomfortable

text: Price clearly stated above product but product range up wrong  manager said price has to be on actual product for him to give it for that price. Nothing in the store has price on actual product hardly. Spent over an hour and still unresolved.

name: C Tuck
text:
If I could give zero stars I would!

So, in 2017, We had Lowe’s install new gutters with gutter guards (at their suggestion). We noticed that our roof above our front door has started to leak even more now, so we called our insurance about it. They checked it out, confirmed there was damage. Referred someone who could get the job done. Simple, claim stuff. The guy who is replacing our roof observed that the gutters were actually installed wrong and are causing water to sit on my roof AND rotting the wood underneath the shingles. LOWES will not do anything about it because of when they were installed and because they went through a contractor. SMH. Wish I’d known that before I bought all my bathroom remodeling supplies from them, I will no longer buy from Lowe’s. They have installed carpet in my house, through contractors before, I never thought I would have to go behind them and check accuracy and quality! I have my living room and kitchen that I am gettin ready to remodel, sadly I’ll have to shop elsewhere! I am a very DISAPPOINTED customer!

Hope it's close to the same thing.

Finally drove 40 minutes to the store and they did not have what I needed,it would have been very nice to have known that before I went.
I mean seriously I will try and never do business with these people again.

name: Constance Watkins
text:
I paid for an upright freezer on 7/15/20. While in the store the clerk stated that they had 1 more left and that it could be delivered the next day.  I  waited from 8am to 8pm for the appliance.  When I finally got someone,  the appliance was not on the truck or in the store.
I was then told that it was ordered.   2 weeks  later another delivery day was set up.   By the end of the day, no freezer.      A month later received  a call and text message for next day delivery.   Again, no delivery.  By the forth call and text which was on a Sunday,  I  called the store and .o one would answer the phone.   Later that evening when I did get someone, still no product.    I called  the corporate office and complained.   I never got a call to apologize for my inconvenience. I spoke with the corporate office about getting my money back and was told the store could do it over the phone.   When I called and finally got someone to answer the phone. I  was told that I had to come in. When I got there, the clerk said they could not give me the money for the warranty.   At that point I  demanded  my money and the manager
The clerk walked off and someone else came and told me the manager was in a training meeting.  Considering All That I'd been through,  the manager should have come out.  He was the only one that could authorize the refund.   It took 2. Weeks to get my money credited back to my card.  I will never go to Lowes in GARDENDALE ever again
The service was horrible and management a joke.  If you are handicap this is not the store to go to.  90 days of lies and he'll is what I got.  Considering that the merchandise was paid for and my account FLAGGED TO give a phone call on updates, I received NOTHING.
VERY POOOOOR SERVICE.

text:
Have to say I wS pretty disappointed on this trip.  This store has gone way downhill in the past few months.  I went to the lumber department to price wood for a project. A full third of the bins were empty.  The sad thing is that what they did hqve out was in the wrong place!  2x6x10 where the 4x6x12 should have been.  All of it was like this.  It was impossible to tell what the price was on anything!

Throughout the store, asiles were blocked by pallet jacks or buggies, making navigation difficult at best.  To think I drove nearly an hour just to go here....

name: Dr. D
text: I purchased a stove and everything that could go wrong did and with terrible customer support. First they never called me to confirm my delivery date of my product. I found it online which was a Monday. Well they showed up Sunday unannounced. Lucky i was there but unfortunately there was a dent. I called that day to Lowes Online Customer Support which stated someone will call me from the store that it was fulfilled to fix the problem. I called the store this time and they wanted me to uninstall everything and just give me a whole new one which i stated that I couldn't do that because i paid someone to connect everything which would mean that i would have to pay them again. She stated that they couldn't help me with that. I finally convinced them to just order the storage shelve that was dented and it would maybe take 2 months. At this point Im like whatever. They get me to Chris the appliance guy and he states that they have a whole unit in stock and they would deliver that shelve to me the next day. I was happy and ready to put this behind me. If only it was that easy. Chris stated that someone would call me the next morning to inform me of the time frame that day for delivery. They never called or showed up. That was Monday. I have been calling multiply time today to try and get this resolved but no one is answering their phone in the delivery department. Very frustrated and wish this issue would be fixed already

name: Katie Malone
text: I recently purchased appliances for the first time from Lowe's. This was the worst experience I have ever had with a store - big or small. After multiple set up deliveries that never showed, I had to call the store, spend way too long on the call carousel, and ultimately had to take my complaints to corporate. When they were forced to call me back, I felt like my problems had been resolved, and my appliance would be delivered. The next day, I received an email that my fridge was ready to be picked up. After calling the store AGAIN, it was finally sorted out. I think I got lucky and spoke to someone who cared that it had been nearly two months of waiting. After the microwave with the original delivery didn't fit my space, Lowe's in Fultondale denied my return on day 57 of 60 with no reasoning except that their "policy had just changed." I will no longer shop at Lowe's. What a nightmare.

text: I went to this location to buy a washer, the guy in appliance was all over the place to busy to help anyone. I finally got his attention long enough for him to tell me they are sold out of washers. That they only had one left. Well I got the one they had. Waited a week to get it delivered when it arrived it was dented up, I sent it back they brought me another out. After getting it in and hooked up and reading the manual on it it wasn’t what I was looking for. I might would have realized that had the guy that was half way helping us wouldn’t have been so pushy on us making our mind up. I called them over an hour with no answer are they would pick up and hang up. So I went down there the manager was outright rude and rolled her eyes at me. Finally got some help in getting it scheduled for pick up and refunded. So I went to the Loews in Trussville to get another washer because this location said the same thing we are sold out. Fultondale was supposed to pick this washer up today and Trussville bring my new one out. Fultondale still has not picked up their washer yet and I have tried to call for over an hour and no answer or the hang up on me. I am a manager and know how busy and crazy it can be but that is why you have employees with good customer service skills to help. Fultondale dose not have good management or customer service.

text: This Lowes really needs to work on their employee culture and overall customer service. Over the past several years, my husband and I have purchased several large appliances. All of which were a nightmare of an experience.  No communication about delivery and expectations once your item is paid for. No delivery confirmations/calls from the "warehouse". The first items were a washer and dryer and fridge - they showed up 2 days late. Frustrating considering we needed the items urgently AND we took time off to be there at delivery time. Most recent was a dishwasher. The man in the back who sold us the dishwasher seemed like he would rather be anywhere BUT work. Honestly, we would have walked right out if it wasn't for the fact that I had some rewards to use at Lowes. He gave no information and in fact, told me I should "search online and compare dishwashers" because he wasn't an expert and didn't have a say on any of them. Then we asked about delivery. He had no info - not even on the process and we explained we had a bad experience before. Instead of sticking up for or explaining to us that maybe it was a fluke, he went on to talk about the "warehouse" and how many complaints they get on them. Not very reassuring. Our dishwasher didn't show up today so we will be canceling our order and we just opened a Home Depot account - so Lowes, you have lost a customer.

name: Sir Consumer
text:
Today July 7, 2020, Lowe's in Fultondale seems to minimize the risk of Covid 19 by allowing patrons to opt in or out on a county wide mask wearing mandate. Sadly I noticed today and  just a few days ago the same practices. THE MASK should cover the nose and the mouth! It isn't a college or super intellectual level of comprehension. Air is taken in thru the nasal passage as well as by mouth.
Jefferson County is under a county wide mask required mandate. This is to protect everyone. This mandate is essential in providing some precautions allowing businesses to stay open. Why are patrons allowed to enter Lowe's without a mask?? No mask No entry.
Cigerettes and pets aren't allowed due to potential dangers and risk to others. Wearing a mask is no different. It provides some safety measures as the rules No Pets and No Smoking inside.

name: Melissa Thomas
text: My husband, a veteran and law enforcement officer, and I just left this location not even 10 minutes ago. We went in to return a work desk that he had purchased yesterday, only to come home and find out that pieces are broken and missing. When we arrived at the return desk we were greeted angrily by a lady named Shelia (her tag said CSA Front Desk). She was in the process of helping another gentleman with a wheelbarrow at the time we arrived so I shrugged her attitude off as frustration to begin with. By the time she got to us she took the receipt from my husband, asked angrily what was wrong to which he informed her that the desk portion (the main part of the item) was broken down the middle and pieces were missing. She rolled her eyes, mumbled a few things, then started to walk away and as she was walking into another room yelled back at us "you know it's a clearance item right?!"  She then came back out of that room, struggled to get the lid off the box and then continued to tell us in a displeasing tone that our kobalt work desk was on clearance. I then stated "so does clearance mean that pieces are broken? If so, lowes should not be selling clearance items". She then argued with me that clearance items are usually returns with missing pieces and I restated that the main portion of the item is completely broken in half. I don't care if it's clearance or not, it was not marked down nearly enough to compensate for a complete useless, damaged piece. She then slammed a refund receipt down and asked my husband to sign. She never asked if we wanted to swap it with a usable piece. She never asked anything, actually. During this entire transaction she was rude and everything anyone in customer service should not be. She was also complaining and cussing under her breath about no one answering the phone around there during our entire few minutes with her. When we were leaving there were 2 more men waiting patiently behind us and just staring in disbelief at what they witnessed and would unfortunately encounter. I told one man good luck as we walked off and he said it looked like he needed it. Needless to say, if lowes in fultondale is going to hire individuals of her caliber, we will not step foot back in that store and may in fact just take our business to Home Depot.

text: We went here to purchase cabinets, the process started on Nov. 21st 2016. We have spent over $20k in the past 6months. It took them four times to measure our kitchen correctly, also had a lady insult my fiancé in our own home. Finally when we ordered the cabinets a few weeks later, we were told it would take 30 days to get them in and possibly a week extra to get them installed. Two days before we were supposed to get the cabinets in we received an email from the man we was working with stating that he was sorry, the order was incorrect and said he was leaving that he couldn't help us any longer. Well 3 cabinets were missing, and was measured incorrectly...... AGAIN. Don is the assistant manager over there and is terrible. We met with him and got another person to come measure... again and said we had to wait another 30days before it could be here and another 1-2weeks to install. Well the installer said when they got here he couldn't finish the trim because something was not finished. Don has told us from the start that we would sit down and discuss what needs to be done to make this right. I have called lowes 20 times and got Don at least 10 and said he would call me back. HE NEVER DOES. I have asked for the store manager Jeff left messages, still no answer. We have been dealing with this for 6 months and spent a lot of money for a normal person. LOWES IS THE WORST STORE, MOST OF THEIR EMPLOYEES ARE RUDE AND HAVE NO CUSTOMER SERVICE ABILTIY AT ALL. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND LOWES TO ANYBODY EVER.

name: Tom Mosley
text: We recently purchased a Lawn mower from Lowe's and used it 2 times and then it started sputtering and smoking and would not crank.  We bought the extended warranty with the mower, but when we tried to bring it back they made us pay $80.00 to send it off to be worked on and then they called us a week later and told us the mower had contaminated gas and it would not be covered under the warranty and it was going to cost us $127.00 to fix. We put brand new gas in the mower before we used it.  We will NEVER again purchase one of Lowe's warranty's because they do NOT stand behind their product.
